string.value: You've decided to prepare a bowl of Adolescent Wolf Vitamins for #t1902015#. Head to #b#m230000003##k to buy ingredients from #b#p2060005##k.

#p2060005# claims to have the vitamins necessary for Adolescent Wolves and agrees to sell them to you for 40 million mesos. *Sigh* It's a lot of money, but you should buy them for the sake of your wolf's health and well-being.\r\n\r\n#b40,000,000 mesos#k
You paid 40 million mesos and bought some of Adolescent Wolf Vitamins from #p2060005#.

Hey, you're the one that bought the #t4032331# last time, right? How's the wolf pup growing? Come to think of it, it must be going through its adolescent stages right about now...\n#b#L0#(You ask about #t4032333#.)#l\n#k
Ahhh, are you talking about #t4032333#? Of course I have it with me. Wolves that are going through their adolescent stages require more nutrients than usual, so would you like to buy some more?
As more nutrients are included in #t4032333# than #t4032331#, it also costs more… 40,000,000 mesos, or #b40 million mesos#k, to be exact.

Way too expensive? I know, the market's been completely crazy these days and I can't even meet my payroll for #p2060006#. That's how rough it's been running #m230000003#... Otherwise, I would give you a discount.
I suppose you don't need any #t4032333# for your wolf? Your wolf might become malnourished then…
Are you going to purchase some #t4032333#? If you hand me your mesos, these vitamins will be yours.

Wow, for you to spend that many mesos… you must really love your wolf. I guarantee that with a master like you, the wolf will weather the storm and emerge from its adolescence fully grown. Please take care of it.
I don't think you have #b40 million mesos on you#k. I do know that it's quite a lot of money for a wolf, but a companion like that cannot be measured in price.
